hevs.gdx2d.lib

Class GdxGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • hevs.gdx2d.lib.GdxGraphics

  • public class GdxGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
    A game graphics implementation for LibGDX based on the interface of FunGraphics for INF1 class
    Version:
    1.52
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry (mui), Nils Chatton (chn), Christopher Metrailler (mei)

      Draws the University of Applied Sciences Western Switzerland logo
      As this project is mainly aimed the students from the inf1 course given at the HES-SO Valais, systems engineering, it is nice to have a logo for them !

        Draws the University of Applied Sciences Western Switzerland logo
        As this project is mainly aimed the students from the inf1 course given at the HES-SO Valais, systems engineering, it is nice to have a logo for them !

        public void drawLine(float p1x,

            float p2x,

        Draws a line that start at P(p1x, p1y) and ends at P(p2x, p2y)
        Parameters:
        p1x - Start coordinate X
        p1y - Start coordinate Y
        p2x - End coordinate X
        p2y - End coordinate Y

      • drawLine

        public void drawLine(float p1x,
            float p1y,
            float p2x,
            float p2y,
            Color c)
        Draws a line that start at P(p1x, p1y) and ends at P(p2x, p2y) with color c
        Parameters:
        p1x - Start coordinate X
        p1y - Start coordinate Y
        p2x - End coordinate X
        p2y - End coordinate Y
        c - The color for drawing the line

      • drawTransformedPicture

        public void drawTransformedPicture(float posX,
                          float posY,
                          float angle,
                          float scale,
                          BitmapImage bitmap)
        Draws a picture at position (posX, posY). Center of rotation is located in the middle of the image.

      • drawTransformedPicture

        public void drawTransformedPicture(float posX,
                          float posY,
                          float angle,
                          float width,
                          float height,
                          BitmapImage bitmap)
        Draws a picture at position (posX, posY) with a fixed width and height (not the one of the BitmapImage itself).

      • drawTransformedPicture

      • drawShader

        public void drawShader(float shaderTime)

      • drawShader

        public void drawShader(int posX,
              int posY,
              float shaderTime)
        Request shader rendering that passes an uniform value with the current rendering location.
        Parameters:
        posX - The value passed to the shader, might be discarded
        posY - The value passed to the shader, might be discarded
        shaderTime - The value passed to the shader, might be discarded

      • setShader

        public void setShader(java.lang.String s)
        Sets a shader that will be drawable
        Parameters:
        s - The path of the shader file

      • setShader

        public void setShader(java.lang.String s,
             int width,
             int height)
        Sets a shader that will be drawn
        Parameters:
        s - The path of the shader
        height - The height of the texture to draw the shader on
        width - The width of the texture to draw the shader on
